title: MOOC Design Based on Transformative Learning Assessment for Nurses

context.prior_knowledge: Bachelor’s degree in nursing or at least five years of clinical experience
context.additional_context: Need to establish a project-based assessment system optimized for smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate reflective levels of at least three stages among Mezirow’s seven stages of transformative learning in project deliverables
Learners analyze problems identified in actual nursing settings using a PBL approach and propose alternative practical solutions
Using peer assessment rubrics, learners identify transformative learning elements in peers’ project deliverables with 80% accuracy

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
